name: Netanel Raviv
content: Home | Raviv Lab | Washington University in St. Louis Skip to content Skip to search Skip to footer Washington University in St. Louis I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, McKelvey School of Engineering, Washington University in Saint Louis. I received my PhD (CS), MSc (CS), and BSc (Math) from the Technion at ’17, ’13, and ’10. I am a computer/information scientist and an applied mathematician with a passion towards real world applications. My research focuses in applications of coding techniques to computation, privacy, and storage. In my free time I am a devout competitive cyclist, an avid hiker, and an amateur pianist. netanel.raviv@wustl.edu
